page.title: 18A YOUNG BOY'S DIARY.
page.content: Every night after school,I help my Mam and Dad.Dad and I go away visiting to get parts for cars,motorbikes and tractors.We usually buy cheap bikes,fix them and sell them.Dad pays me for helping him.Later on my Mam goes to workso we wash the dishes and I put them away.Afterwards we take my little sister for a walk.My other sister helps Mam clean the Forestry Commission's Office. I have goy five favourite television programmes I enjoy watching on our colour television.They are called,The Young Ones,Murder,Mystery and Suspense The Mad Death,The Avengers and Charlie Chaplin. When I go to bed I read for about ten minutes and then I go to sleep. I am in my last year at Primary school at the beginning of next term in September.
